thread.title: Divvy daily rate to go up on bike rentals
thread.title_full: Divvy daily rate to go up on bike rentals

title: Divvy daily rate to go up on bike rentals
text: Divvy daily rate to go up on bike rentals Jul 17, 2015, 1:00pm CDT Share The Divvy bicycle daily fee in Chicago will go up to $9.95 beginning July 22. Riding around town on a Divvy bicycle is going to get a little more expensive. The daily fee for a 24-hour pass is expected to rise to $9.95 from $7 , ABC7 reported. The increase is slated for July 22, and will mostly affect tourists, of whom two-thirds are daily users of Divvy, the report said. The elevated fee will put Chicago on par with New York’s Citi Bike system, which charges $9.95, and San Francisco’s fee of $9 per day, ABC7 reported. The $75 annual Divvy membership is not affected by the fee increases, according to the report. Divvy began back in 2013, after being delayed a year due to testing. The company
